entry.title: Gotham is the worst
entry.summary:
Author: Frey_S

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,085Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 304

Summary: On top of Hal's list of things he hates are three things: charity galas, Gotham and Batman. So of course he ends up dealing with all of those in one night, even if he doesn't technically know he ends up sleeping with that last one. He's never letting Carol drag him to rich people events ever again. In which Hal dates Bruce Wayne. Tells him he's Green Lantern. Breaks up with him. And then sort of dates Batman without knowing that he is in fact sleeping with Bruce Wayne again. [More tags to be added in the future probably]

entry.title: The room where sunlight could not reach [English version]
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,322Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 43

Summary: His amber eyes were the only warm thing in that dreadful room, and they were saying to Bruce, "Have your ways with me, however you like." Every confession shall be heard and every sin shall be forgiven. "Bruce," he called Bruce, with his honeyed lips, "Fuck me." Or. Hal woke up inside a room with just him and 5 other Bruces. And his Bruce, the one he had just fought with yesterday, told him that all 5 versions of Bruce Wayne needed to be satisfied for them to leave the room.Satisfy how? Sexually, of course.

entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,951Chapters: 3/31Kudos: 64

Summary: Thirty-one days. Thirty-one prompts. Thirty-one kinks. A personal Kinktober challenge, to practice with smut writing, with also exploring different pairings across the DC and Marvel universes. Each chapter is a fic inspired by my own favorite dynamics.
